revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=AeroScout |model=Exciter EX |revision=5100 |upc= |ean= |asin= |price= |est_release_date= |fcc_date=03/08/2013 |manuf_country= |manuf= |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability= |type=RFID scanner |fcc_id=Q3HEX5100 |ic_id=5115A-EX5100 |pwr_v=48 |pwr_amp=0.5 |pwr_poe=af |cpu1_brand=Freescale Semiconductor |cpu1_model=MCF52258 |cpu1_cspeed= |fla1= |fla1_brand= |fla1_model= |fla1_num= |ram1= |ram1_brand= |ram1_model= |ram1_num= |jtag= |serial=yes |wi1_module= |wi1_module_if= |wi1_chip1_brand=G2 Microsystems |wi1_chip1_model=G2C547 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bg |wi1_ant_conn= |eth_none= |eth_cpu= |eth_chip1_brand= |eth_chip1_model= |sw_cpu= |sw_brand= |sw_model= |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=1 |wan_ports= |flags= |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=bg |default_ssid= |default_ssid_regex= |default_ip=192.168.1.178 |default_user= |default_pass= |oui= |oui_eth=00:0C:CC }} [http://www.aeroscout.com/files/AeroScout%20Exciter%20Data%20Sheet.pdf AeroScout Exciter Datasheet]
"AeroScout", "EX-5000", "200-2104-1000", "AD6232T1 41/11" is silkscreened on the top (and bottom) of the main board in the FCC photos. :"TAG-3500", "20020475000", "AeroScout", and "AD5462T5 44/10" is silkscreened on the G2 WiFi module.
The G2 WiFi module is using a [http://embedded-computing.com/news/g2-family-low-power-wi-fiintegrated-circuits/ ''G2 Microsystems'' G2C547] (G2C547-1) SoC for low power WiFi capability. :There appears to be an additional ''Freescale'' microcontroller on the board.
The additional RF module is using a ''Freescale'' M9S / M9S8GT6ACE (M9S8GT6A, CE 4L11Y, CTAX1032) microcontroller and a ''Xilinx'' XC9572XL CPLD.
The microcontroller used in this device appears to be a [http://www.freescale.com/webapp/sps/site/prod_summary.jsp?code=MCF5225X MCF52258 (Coldfire)].
Per the FCC manual, the ''AeroScout'' EX5100 ''includes the following components''... :Bidirectional Wi-Fi module with only the receiver enabled :Wi-Fi transmitter ([http://www.aeroscout.com/t2 T2 Tag]) which is used by the Exciter for health management :Exciter controller :125 KHz LF Tx
The OUI specified on the FCC label is 00:0C:CC (''AeroScout''). This is assumed to be correct. :The sample FCC label also has "Stanley Healthcare Solutions" on it. :Likely P/N: 100-2105-1000
Manuf. in Israel?
